PackageOracle.name: DA_EQUIP_COMPONENT_STATUS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EQUIP_COMPONENT_STATUS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.482750000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_component_id IN NUMBER
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_component_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_equip_component_status;

body.name: DA_EQUIP_COMPONENT_STATUS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EQUIP_COMPONENT_STATUS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.493488000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_component_status.add(fx), parms=' || equip_status_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_component_status a
(
a.equip_component_id
,a.equip_status_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_equip_component_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equip_status_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.equip_component_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_component_status.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_component_status.add, parms=' || equip_status_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_component_status a
(
a.equip_component_id
,a.equip_status_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_equip_component_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equip_status_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_component_status.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_component_id IN NUMBER
,equip_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_component_status.add, parms=' || equip_component_id || '|' || equip_status_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_component_status a
(
a.equip_component_id
,a.equip_status_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.effective_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.equip_component_id
,add.equip_status_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.effective_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_component_status.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_component_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_component_status.del, parms=' || equip_component_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_equip_component_status a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.equip_component_id = del.equip_component_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_component_status.del');

END del;

END da_equip_component_status;
